title: Bolgoda Lakefront 150 perch land for sale
details:
* This property located @ Piliyandala - Dampe road
* Land extend - 150 perches
* This property has 2 plans. You could buy one block as you wish.
* This is a high land and 180 degree lake front view.
* Water front - approximately over 220 feet
* Neighborhood and access road is very good
* There are high, waterfront properties are available only Bolgoda, Dampe area. It is a reason for land value is going high.
* Price – 1000,000 per perch .
